titleStmt.title: The life of faith in death, in expectation of the resurrection from the dead opened in a sermon at the funerall of the right worshipfull Mr. Thomas Slany late maior of the famous town and corporation of King-Lynn in the county of Norfolk : who deceased in the year of his maioralty, Jan. 10. 1649 / preached there by John Horn ...
titleStmt.author: Horn, John, 1614-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
